MajorClaims.Text: both the ability to relate well to people and studying hard in school are important for success in a future job
we should notice to both of them

Claims.Text: each of them has its own benefits
studying hard in school is an important factor to succeed in a job
relating well to people is also another important factor

Premises.Text: If we study them hard, we will have the chance of doing our job better and quicker in the future
We need to know and learn about the theoritical basis of our future job
In school, we are able to identify skills required for our future job and work on mastering and learning them
if someone wants to become a good industrial engineer, he should study his technical courses very well so that he will be able to utilize them well in his future job
One of the other factors for success in a future job is effective commuincation
By relating well to people, we are likely to have a lot of friends
we will have a wide network of communication
if you need help with getting a job, by commuincating with people offering jobs whom you treat well
they respect you as well, you can achieve your goal
if you are a salesman in a store or any other place, by relating well to your customers, you will increase the chance of their coming back again and becoming your regular customers
This can be done in school
